# Project Summary (Features 1-23)

## Architecture Overview
- Using Next.js 14 with App Router
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
- JWT authentication with refresh tokens
- Tailwind CSS for styling

## Completed Categories

### Authentication (Features 1-8)
- User registration with email verification
- Login with JWT tokens (access + refresh)
- Password reset flow
- OAuth integration (Google, GitHub)
- Session management
- Key Decision: Using httpOnly cookies for tokens (dec-003)

### User Profile (Features 9-15)
- Profile CRUD operations
- Avatar upload to S3
- Profile visibility settings
- User preferences
- Activity feed
- Key Decision: Using optimistic UI updates (dec-007)

### API Foundation (Features 16-23)
- RESTful API structure
- Input validation with Zod
- Error handling middleware
- Rate limiting
- API documentation with OpenAPI
- CORS configuration
- Key Decision: Rate limits per user, not IP (dec-012)

## Current State
- All tests passing (127/127)
- No blocking issues
- Ready for next category: Dashboard
